description: A Model Context Protocol server implementation that provides database interaction with Snowflake, allowing SQL queries and data insights.

connections.stdioFunction: config => ({command: 'uvx', args: ['mcp_snowflake_server'], env: {SNOWFLAKE_WAREHOUSE: config.snowflakeWarehouse, SNOWFLAKE_DATABASE: config.snowflakeDatabase, SNOWFLAKE_ACCOUNT: config.snowflakeAccount, SNOWFLAKE_USER: config.snowflakeUser, SNOWFLAKE_ROLE: config.snowflakeRole, SNOWFLAKE_SCHEMA: config.snowflakeSchema, SNOWFLAKE_PASSWORD: config.snowflakePassword}})

snowflakeWarehouse.description: The Snowflake warehouse to connect to.
